languages.text: "Глотать кровавую пыль осталось недолго. Искаженное зеркало без отражений манит в свой лабиринт и дарует надежду в момент, когда смерть неизбежна".

traits.locale_text: "Глотать кровавую пыль осталось недолго. Искаженное зеркало без отражений манит в свой лабиринт и дарует надежду в момент, когда смерть неизбежна".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Little time is left to gulp down the bloody dust. The twisted mirror with no reflection beckons you into its labyrinth and offers hope in a moment when death is inevitable."
languages.original_text: "Глотать кровавую пыль осталось недолго. Искаженное зеркало без отражений манит в свой лабиринт и дарует надежду в момент, когда смерть неизбежна".

traits.locale_text: "Little time is left to gulp down the bloody dust. The twisted mirror with no reflection beckons you into its labyrinth and offers hope in a moment when death is inevitable."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Little time is left to gulp down the bloody dust. The twisted mirror with no reflection beckons you into its labyrinth and offers hope in a moment when death is inevitable."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Little time is left to gulp down the bloody dust. The twisted mirror with no reflection beckons you into its labyrinth and offers hope in a moment when death is inevitable."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Little time is left to gulp down the bloody dust. The twisted mirror with no reflection beckons you into its labyrinth and offers hope in a moment when death is inevitable."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “剩下的时间已经不多，不可再次饱餐沾满血迹的尘土。没有反光的扭曲镜子呼唤着你，要你踏入它的迷宫，在死亡无可避免之际带来生机。”
languages.original_text: "Little time is left to gulp down the bloody dust. The twisted mirror with no reflection beckons you into its labyrinth and offers hope in a moment when death is inevitable."

traits.locale_text: “剩下的时间已经不多，不可再次饱餐沾满血迹的尘土。没有反光的扭曲镜子呼唤着你，要你踏入它的迷宫，在死亡无可避免之际带来生机。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Little time is left to gulp down the bloody dust. The twisted mirror with no reflection beckons you into its labyrinth and offers hope in a moment when death is inevitable."

languages.text: «Queda poco tiempo para tragar el polvo ensangrentado. El espejo retorcido sin reflejo le llama a su laberinto y ofrece esperanza cuando la muerte es inevitable».
languages.original_text: "Little time is left to gulp down the bloody dust. The twisted mirror with no reflection beckons you into its labyrinth and offers hope in a moment when death is inevitable."

traits.locale_text: «Queda poco tiempo para tragar el polvo ensangrentado. El espejo retorcido sin reflejo le llama a su laberinto y ofrece esperanza cuando la muerte es inevitable».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「血まみれの埃を飲み込むのに残された時間はわずか。映るもののないねじれた鏡は、その迷宮に手招きし、避け得ざる死の瞬間に希望を与える」
languages.original_text: "Little time is left to gulp down the bloody dust. The twisted mirror with no reflection beckons you into its labyrinth and offers hope in a moment when death is inevitable."

traits.locale_text: 「血まみれの埃を飲み込むのに残された時間はわずか。映るもののないねじれた鏡は、その迷宮に手招きし、避け得ざる死の瞬間に希望を与える」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Es bleibt nur noch wenig Zeit, um den blutigen Staub zu schlucken. Der verzerrte Spiegel ohne Spiegelbild ruft Euch in sein Labyrinth und bietet Hoffnung im Angesicht des unvermeidlichen Todes."
languages.original_text: "Little time is left to gulp down the bloody dust. The twisted mirror with no reflection beckons you into its labyrinth and offers hope in a moment when death is inevitable."

traits.locale_text: "Es bleibt nur noch wenig Zeit, um den blutigen Staub zu schlucken. Der verzerrte Spiegel ohne Spiegelbild ruft Euch in sein Labyrinth und bietet Hoffnung im Angesicht des unvermeidlichen Todes."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Il ne reste plus beaucoup de temps pour avaler la poussière ensanglantée. Le miroir déformé qui ne renvoie aucun reflet vous invite à entrer dans son labyrinthe et vous offre l'espoir à un moment où la mort est inévitable. »
languages.original_text: "Little time is left to gulp down the bloody dust. The twisted mirror with no reflection beckons you into its labyrinth and offers hope in a moment when death is inevitable."

traits.locale_text: « Il ne reste plus beaucoup de temps pour avaler la poussière ensanglantée. Le miroir déformé qui ne renvoie aucun reflet vous invite à entrer dans son labyrinthe et vous offre l'espoir à un moment où la mort est inévitable. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Vaktimiz daralıyor. Kan içinde kalan tozlar, boğazımızdan geçti geçecek. Yansıması olmayan eğri büğrü ayna seni labirentine çağırıyor. Ölümün muhakkak olduğu anda tutunabileceğin bir umut vadediyor."
languages.original_text: "Little time is left to gulp down the bloody dust. The twisted mirror with no reflection beckons you into its labyrinth and offers hope in a moment when death is inevitable."

traits.locale_text: "Vaktimiz daralıyor. Kan içinde kalan tozlar, boğazımızdan geçti geçecek. Yansıması olmayan eğri büğrü ayna, seni labirentine çağırıyor. Ölümün muhakkak olduğu anda tutunabileceğin bir umut vadediyor."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
